title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 646.2 - Free trial service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 646.2 - Free trial service

State Regulations

Due to the nature of the service provided by
radio-telephone utilities and the number of variables which may affect the
usefulness of the service to particular subscribers, notwithstanding the
provisions of section
601.1
of this Title, radio-telephone utilities, and other telephone corporations providing
radio-telephone service, may provide radio-telephone service free of charge for
a five-day trial period during which the subscriber may gauge the usefulness of
the service to his particular circumstances. The trial service may be provided
to a prospective subscriber once during any two-year period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
646.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
